channel.title: Home on Andrew Struve
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Andrew Struve

item.title: About
item.description: Andrew Struve is a Software Engineer who loves to design excellent software and share his knowledge with others. Andrew lives with his wife, 2 banjos, and 5 basses. Contact: astruve@gmail.com

item.title: My First Post
item.description: This is the beginning. The title is so generic. On this blog I plan to work on some projects and share them with you. I love writing good software and sharing it with others. Nothing is more frustrating than searching around the internet for things that should be simple but are difficult to find. If I can help share something that someone is struggling with, then I am glad to help.
